Nearly 60% (~INR 98 billion) of the modern mattress market in India is controlled by branded play. In the branded market, five leading brands namely Sheela Foam, Wakefit, Duroflex, Sleep company and Peps Industries command ~47% market share. Basis revenue from operations in FY2025, Sheela Foam has the highest market share by value of 19% within the branded modern mattress market. Duroflex is among the top three largest mattress companies in India, with a market share of 8% by value in branded modern mattress for Fiscal 2025.

As of FY2025, the branded modern mattress market in South India is estimated at ~INR 30 billion. Wakefit, Duroflex, and Sheela Foam are among the leading brands in this region. Duroflex, with ~20% market share, is positioned among the top two players in the branded modern mattress segment in South India as of FY2025.

India's growing population base continues to fuel long-term demand for household essentials, including mattresses. As of CY2024, population stands at 1.44 billion and is projected to reach 1.50 billion by CY2029, as per IMF projections.
